name: [Vortex] Hatchet
desc: This inverter W-Engine can generate excessive power and effectively increase its operator's battle prowess. However, due to its poor heat dissipation, it emits ear-splitting noise during battle. As a result, all squad members will need to wear earplugs.
desc2: Equip to increase Stun Agents' combat capabilities
desc3: A frequency-converting W-Engine that can quickly generate excessive power and effectively increase its user's battle prowess.
phaseDescs: Upon becoming the active character in combat, the equipper's Impact increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>9%</ct> for 10s. This effect can trigger once every 20s.
Upon becoming the active character in combat, the equipper's Impact increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>10%</ct> for 10s. This effect can trigger once every 20s.
Upon becoming the active character in combat, the equipper's Impact increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>11%</ct> for 10s. This effect can trigger once every 20s.
Upon becoming the active character in combat, the equipper's Impact increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>12%</ct> for 10s. This effect can trigger once every 20s.
Upon becoming the active character in combat, the equipper's Impact increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>13%</ct> for 10s. This effect can trigger once every 20s.
